foods.name: Double Cheeseburger
foods.description: The McDonald's Double Cheeseburger features two (2) pure all beef patties topped with tangy pickles, chopped onions, ketchup, mustard, and two melty American cheese slices.

foods.name: Chicken Sandwich
foods.description: Crispy coated chicken with lettuce and our sandwich sauce, in a soft, sesame-topped bun.

foods.name: Sausage Burrito
foods.description: McDonald's Sausage Burrito is a delicious breakfast burrito with fluffy eggs & pork sausage.

foods.name: Hamburger
foods.description: McDonald's Sausage Burrito is a delicious breakfast burrito with fluffy eggs & pork sausage.

foods.name: Sausage Biscuit
foods.description: McDonald's Sausage Biscuit is the perfect sausage breakfast sandwich to start your day!

foods.name: Hash Browns
foods.description: Crispy, homemade hash browns are quick, easy, and family-friendly, making them perfect as a side dish for any breakfast or brunch.
